AvailableAt: Begin at Khan's Glory and continue at Anthe.
LevelDescriptionText: 10|You are retrieving information from Anthe for Khan's Glory.~15|You are searching Anthe's sharp-tongued chambers for information to return to Khan's Glory.~20|You are returning information to Khan's Glory from Anthe.~30|You have reliably informed Khan's Glory about a matter in Anthe.

Name: Anthe: Flourishing Intelligence
